formatted_items.content:
I located the most recent email from Emily Stone regarding collaboration with InnovateNow and checked our Notion workspace—there aren’t any pages that specifically mention InnovateNow or partnership discussions.

Before I forward the full email thread (and include a brief summary of key talking points and open questions), could you let me know the correct email address for “[Name]” so I can direct it to the right person?
